overview: Has policewomen, Greta, gone bad & joined forces with Sonny, a crime lord? Two of her fellow policewomen are on her trail to find out. With Greta seducing a fellow cop and planting evidence against him. Things don't look good. Is Greta undercover or just getting lured into Sonny's sexual amusements?
tagline: Put a little spice in your life!
title: Miami Spice II
